means: （痛苦，感情，冷气等）感觉得到的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"意识到的"之意。
means: aware ：强调通过耳闻目睹或感觉而得到的信息，也指敏税的观察和推断。侧重感知，多与of一起用。
conscious ：指内心的感觉，强调深刻的心理活动。
sensible ：侧重通过直觉或理性感觉意识到某物的存在。

word_mean: 经常处于意识范围内的思维部分，为Freud局部解剖思维模型的系统之一。参见preconscious和uncoscious

sentence.Network_en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentence.Network_en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentence.Network_cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentence.Network_en: Beneath the conscious mind there are many levels of the unconscious.
sentence.Network_cn: 在意识心理之下存在很多层次的无意识。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'being aware of wrongdoing'): from Latin conscius 'knowing with others or in oneself' (from conscire 'be privy to') + -ous

entry.def: If you are conscious of something, you notice it or realize that it is happening.

example.ex: He was conscious of the faint, musky aroma of after-shave...
example.tran: 他注意到了须后水淡淡的麝香味。

example.ex: She was very conscious of Max studying her...
example.tran: 她非常清楚马克斯在仔细端详她。

entry.tran: (尤指由于不满或自觉重要而)注意的，关注的
entry.def: If you are conscious of something, you think about it a lot, especially because you are unhappy about it or because you think it is important.

example.ex: I'm very conscious of my weight...
He is acutely conscious that this transition will bring with it the risk of social unrest.
example.tran: 他非常清楚这种转变伴随着社会动乱的危险。

entry.def: A conscious decision or action is made or done deliberately with you giving your full attention to it.

example.ex: I don't think we ever made a conscious decision to have a big family...
example.tran: 我觉得我们没有刻意地决定要生很多孩子。

example.ex: Make a conscious effort to relax your muscles.

entry.def: Someone who is conscious is awake rather than asleep or unconscious.

example.ex: She was fully conscious all the time and knew what was going on.
example.tran: 她一直都很清醒，知道是怎么回事。

entry.tran: (记忆或想法)有意识的，意识到的
entry.def: Conscious memories or thoughts are ones that you are aware of.

example.ex: He had no conscious memory of his four-week stay in hospital...
example.tran: 他对自己住院的4个星期没有任何有意识的记忆。

example.ex: Beneath the conscious mind there are many levels of the unconscious.
example.tran: 在意识心理之下存在很多层次的无意识。

sentences.sentence: "a conscious effort to speak more slowly"

means.word_mean: 2. knowing and perceiving; having awareness of surroundings and sensations and thoughts;

sentences.sentence: "became conscious that he was being followed"

means.word_mean: 3. (followed by `of') showing realization or recognition of something;

sentences.sentence: "few voters seem conscious of the issue's importance"
"the careful tread of one conscious of his alcoholic load"- Thomas Hardy

auth_sentence.res_content_con: How will we know when a device is conscious?

auth_sentence.content: Until they become conscious, they will never rebel.
auth_sentence.res_content: Until they become conscious, they will never rebel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Until they become conscious, they will never rebel.

auth_sentence.content: One part being conscious of stimuli and one not.
auth_sentence.res_content: One part being conscious of stimuli and one not.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One part being conscious of stimuli and one not.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家

means.word_mean: 神志清醒的；有知觉的；有意识的

sentences.en: She spoke to us in her conscious moments.
sentences.cn: 她神志清醒时跟我们说过话。

sentences.en: He is badly hurt but still conscious.
sentences.cn: 他伤得很重, 不过神志还清醒。

means.word_mean: 知道的; 注意到的；意识到

sentences.en: I was not conscious of having made a mistake.
They were conscious that he disapproved.
I had to make a conscious effort not to be rude to her.
sentences.cn: 我得刻意约束自己不要对她粗鲁。

jushi.english: I had to make a conscious effort not to be rude to her.
jushi.chinese: 我得刻意约束自己不要对她粗鲁。

jushi.english: He spoke to me in his conscious moments.
jushi.chinese: 他神志清醒时跟我说过话。

jushi.english: His rudeness was conscious, not accidental.
jushi.chinese: 他的粗暴无礼是故意的,不是偶然的。
